## PopulatableARTH.sendARTH() method

Send ARTH tokens to an address.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
sendARTH(toAddress: string, amount: Decimalish): Promise<PopulatedARTHTransaction<P, SentARTHTransaction<S, ARTHReceipt<R, void>>>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  toAddress | string | Address of receipient. |
|  amount | [Decimalish](./arth-base.decimalish.md) | Amount of ARTH to send. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[PopulatedARTHTransaction](./arth-base.populatedarthtransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;P, [SentARTHTransaction](./arth-base.sentarthtransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;S, [ARTHReceipt](./arth-base.arthreceipt.md)<!-- -->&lt;R, void&gt;&gt;&gt;&gt;
